name: The Breeding: The Fog
description:
In the near future, atmospheric toxin levels have reached unprecedented heights. A ground breaking experiment using genetically modified microbes to eat up and breakdown the toxins to less hazardous molecules have been deployed into the atmosphere by world governments.
This stride has proven successful. However, a few months down the line, things have gone awry leading to persistent toxic fog and erratic weather as well as the appearance of unknown creepy toxic creatures called the “Breeds”.
World governments deployed the military and other law enforcement agents to maintain order as well as protect civilians. However things get out of hand, with safe zones created across the world to safeguard the surviving civilians.
Main Features
– Point and click action adventure.
– Randomly generated seamless world (No loading screen).
– Night and Day cycle.
– Erratic weather system (Rain,.Snow, Slit, Foggy atmosphere, Constant thunder claps and lightning).
– Localization in multiple languages (English, Russian, French, German, Italian, Polish, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese, Turkish).
– Voice over.
– Resource management.
